name: A Rainbow Killer
description:
The fourth entry in the series of the spiders with gemstone eyes. This time it is Wolf spider with the colorful eyes of malachite, topaz, beryl, opal, agate, and bloodstone... As one can see, these stones belong to the top list of valuable crystals. And the fact that the spider possesses so many speaks clearly of his attitude towards the rest of the world. In fact, this spider is a vicious, ruthless predator; one can tell by looking at his aggressive stance. And those ferocious mandibles won't let even the smallest piece of his prey escape. Perhaps, with such warlike attitude the spider should be a gang leader, say, of Chinese Triads, and who would argue that those guys know nothing about what the true power is...

The stones themselves are meant to be worn by an audacious personality. For instance, bloodstones are associated with bravery and vitality. Topaz cuts through doubt and uncertainty. Agate grants its owner ability to subdue storms and lightnings. Malachite strengthens the lifeforce in those who wear it. Opals help to predict the future... Naturally, the owner of such collection of magnificent stones is someone to be reckoned with. As a result, our Rainbow Killer can not be spotted, apprehended, stopped. He is very dangerous, unpredictable, and always hungry...

His latin name should be:

Iris sicarius
